question: [File: third_party/move/tools/move-bytecode-viewer/src/bytecode_viewer.rs] [Function: new()] [Panic/DoS] Can an attacker provide a malformed CompiledModule that causes the Disassembler::disassemble().unwrap() call to panic on line 40-41, leading to process crash and potential denial of service if this tool is used in production validator infrastructure?
